jokes.question: Why don't scientists trust atoms?
Did you hear about the mathematician who's afraid of negative numbers?
jokes.answer: He'll stop at nothing to avoid them!

jokes.question: Why don't skeletons fight each other?
Why did the scarecrow win an award?
jokes.answer: Because he was outstanding in his field!

jokes.question: What did one wall say to the other wall?
jokes.answer: I'll meet you at the corner!

jokes.question: Why did the bicycle fall over?
How does a penguin build its house?
What do you call a fake noodle?
Why don't eggs tell jokes?
How does a scientist freshen their breath?
Why don't vampires go to barbecues?
What do you call a snowman with a six-pack?
What's brown and sticky?
Why did the tomato turn red?
jokes.answer: Because it saw the salad dressing!

jokes.question: Why don't ants ever get sick?
What do you get if you cross a snowman and a vampire?
What's orange and sounds like a parrot?
What's the tallest building in the world?
jokes.answer: The library because it has the most stories!

jokes.question: Why was the math book sad?
jokes.answer: Because it had too many problems!

jokes.question: What do you call a bear with no teeth?
What do you get if you cross a snowman and a dog?
Why did the golfer bring two pairs of pants?
jokes.answer: In case he got a hole in one!

jokes.answer: Because he was outstanding in his field!
